member.name: T:FHSDKPortable.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: Contains the entry class of the FeedHenry SDK for Windows Phone 8 platform. It's defined in the FHSDKPhone.dll. To use the FeedHenry SDK, both FHSDK.dll and FHSDKPhone.dll should be referenced by your WP8 project, and initialise the SDK using the FHClient class in this name space.

member.name: T:FHSDKPortable.FHClient
member.summary: Initialise the FeedHenry SDK. This should be called before any other API functions are invoked. Usually this should be called after the app finish intialising.
member.returns: If Init is success or not

member.name: T:FHSDK.Services.Auth.OAuthClientHandlerService
member.summary: OAuth login handler for windows phone

member.name: T:FHSDK.Services.Data.DataService
member.summary: On device data service provider for windows phone

member.name: T:FHSDK.Services.Device.DeviceService
member.summary: Device info service for windows phone

member.name: T:FHSDK.Services.Network.NetworkService
member.summary: Network service provider for windows phone
